timeline.message: Report anonymous roles in authenticate response

timeline.bodyText: This is rather verbose but I don't have any good suggestions to do otherwise and we don't seem to have a generic need for a cloneWithChanges method !

replies.bodyText: I initially had this logic inside the User class, i.e. User#withRoles with the intention to simply things here. But as you said, there is no generic need for this type of method, which made it seem out of place. So I decided to keep everything in this one class. It is verbose but at least self-contained and hopefully easy to understand.
